Package common

Interface IClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    public interface IClient
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Defines the RMI Remote Server Object for game clients that allows connections outside of individual rooms.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String BOUND_NAME
      The name the IClient object will be bound to in the RMI Registry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void connect​(IClient remoteConnectionStub)
      Used to connect to another IClient.
      java.util.List<IGroup> getGroups()  
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name of this user.
      void quit​(IClient remoteConnectionStub)
      Tells the remote system that holds this IStaffImplRemoteConnection object that the given IStaffImplRemoteConnection stub is no longer valid and should be removed from their system.
      void receiveInvite​(IGroup group)
      This is used to send an already connected client an invite to their group.

    • Field Detail

      • BOUND_NAME

        static final java.lang.String BOUND_NAME
        The name the IClient object will be bound to in the RMI Registry
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect​(IClient remoteConnectionStub)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Used to connect to another IClient. When you call this method on a foreign IClient stub you give the foreign chatapp associated with this stub your IStaffImplRemoteConnection stub (so that they know how to communicate with you).
        Parameters:
        remoteConnectionStub - - stub of IStaffImplRemoteConnection from the connector
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs with remote connections.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the name of this user.
        Returns:
        The name of this user, as defined locally.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs with remote connections.

      • receiveInvite

        void receiveInvite​(IGroup group)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This is used to send an already connected client an invite to their group. The inviter provides a IGroup to the invitee
        Parameters:
        group - A serialized IGroup to join.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs with remote connections.

      • getGroups

        java.util.List<IGroup> getGroups()
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • quit

        void quit​(IClient remoteConnectionStub)
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Tells the remote system that holds this IStaffImplRemoteConnection object that the given IStaffImplRemoteConnection stub is no longer valid and should be removed from their system. The application quitting process must entail telling all known IStaffImplRemoteConnection stubs that one is quitting. You must leave all chatrooms (send a message with ILeaveData) before using this method.
        Parameters:
        remoteConnectionStub - stub to be removed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs with remote connections.
